name: WhatsApp Business Cloud Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 WhatsApp Business Cloud Tool 节点。主要用于: Access WhatsApp API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Access WhatsApp API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: message

operation.name: operation
operation.description: The operation to perform on the media
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 作用: The operation to perform on the media | 默认值: mediaUpload

messagingProduct.name: messagingProduct
messagingProduct.natural_language_description: 参数名: Messaging Product | 默认值: whatsapp

phoneNumberId.name: phoneNumberId
phoneNumberId.description: The ID of the business account's phone number to store the media
phoneNumberId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sender Phone Number (or ID) | 作用: The ID of the business account's phone number to store the media | (必填项)

recipientPhoneNumber.name: recipientPhoneNumber
recipientPhoneNumber.description: Phone number of the recipient of the message
recipientPhoneNumber.natural_language_description: 参数名: Recipient's Phone Number | 作用: Phone number of the recipient of the message | 提示: When entering a phone number, make sure to include the country code | (必填项)

messageType.name: messageType
messageType.natural_language_description: 参数名: MessageType | 作用: The type of the message | 默认值: text

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 默认值: {}

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: mediaFileName (值: None) - The name to use for the file

textBody.name: textBody
textBody.description: The body of the message (max 4096 characters)
textBody.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text Body | 作用: The body of the message (max 4096 characters) | (必填项)

mediaPath.name: mediaPath
mediaPath.description: Use a link, an ID, or n8n to upload a video
mediaPath.natural_language_description: 参数名: Take Video From | 作用: Use a link, an ID, or n8n to upload a video | 默认值: useMediaLink
available_options: Link (值: useMediaLink) - When using a link, WhatsApp will download the video, saving you the step of uploading video yourself
WhatsApp Media (值: useMediaId) - You can use an ID if you have already uploaded the video to WhatsApp
n8n (值: useMedian8n) - Upload a binary file on the item being processed in n8n

mediaLink.name: mediaLink
mediaLink.description: Link of the media to be sent
mediaLink.natural_language_description: 参数名: Link | 作用: Link of the media to be sent

mediaId.name: mediaId
mediaId.description: ID of the media to be sent
mediaId.natural_language_description: 参数名: ID | 作用: ID of the media to be sent

mediaPropertyName.name: mediaPropertyName
mediaPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property which contains the data for the file to be uploaded
mediaPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Property Name | 作用: Name of the binary property which contains the data for the file to be uploaded | 默认值: data | (必填项)

mediaFilename.name: mediaFilename
mediaFilename.description: The name of the file (required when using a file ID)
mediaFilename.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filename | 作用: The name of the file (required when using a file ID) | (必填项)

template.name: template
template.natural_language_description: 参数名: Template | 作用: Name of the template | (必填项)

components.name: components
components.natural_language_description: 参数名: Components | 默认值: {}

mediaGetId.name: mediaGetId
mediaGetId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Media ID | 作用: The ID of the media | (必填项)

mediaDeleteId.name: mediaDeleteId
mediaDeleteId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Media ID | 作用: The ID of the media | (必填项)

responseType.name: responseType
responseType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Type | 默认值: approval
available_options: Approval (值: approval) - User can approve/disapprove from within the message
Free Text (值: freeText) - User can submit a response via a form
Custom Form (值: customForm) - User can submit a response via a custom form

defineForm.name: defineForm
defineForm.natural_language_description: 参数名: Define Form | 默认值: fields

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput

formFields.name: formFields
formFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Elements | 默认值: {}

approvalOptions.name: approvalOptions
approvalOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Approval Options | 默认值: {}

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: responseFormTitle (值: None) - Title of the form that the user can access to provide their response
responseFormDescription (值: None) - Description of the form that the user can access to provide their response
responseFormCustomCss (值: None) - Override default styling of the response form with CSS
limitWaitTime (值: None) - Whether the workflow will automatically resume execution after the specified limit type
appendAttribution (值: None) - Whether to include the phrase "This message was sent automatically with n8n" to the end of the message
